Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Iwo adatsatira zimene a Satana adanena mu Ufumu wa Solomoni. Sikuti Solomoni sadakhulupirire ai koma a Satana ndiwo sadakhulupirire. Iwo amaphunzitsa anthu matsenga ndi zimene zidavumbulutsidwa kwa angelo awiri Harut ndi Marut ku Babuloni. Koma iwo samaphunzitsa wina aliyense mpaka atanena kuti: “Ndithudi ife tili kukuyesani inu, ndipo musakhale wosakhulupirira ayi.” Kuchokera kwa angelo chimene chimamasula pakati pa mwamuna ndi mkazi wake, ndipo iwo sadaononge wina aliyense ndi zimene adaphunzira kupatula ndi chilolezo cha Mulungu. Iwo amaphunzira zinthu zimene zimawaononga ndipo sizidawapindulire china chilichonse. Ndithudi iwo amadziwa kuti aliyense amene amachita matsenga sadzakhala ndi gawo m’moyo umene uli nkudza. Zopanda pake ndi zimene agulitsa nazo moyo wawo, iwo akadadziwa
Iwo akadakhulupirira ndi kudziteteza ku zoipa, mphotho yawo yochokera kwa Ambuye wawo ikanakhala yabwino, ngati iwo akadadziwa
oh inu anthu okhulupirira! Musanene kwa Mtumwi wathu kuti: “Timvere ife” koma muyenera kunena kuti mutiyang’anile ife ndipo mverani. Anthu onse osakhulupirira ali ndi chilango chowawa

Sichifuniro cha anthu osakhulupirira amene ali pakati pa anthu otsatira za Buku kapena anthu akunja kuti china chake chabwino chidze kwa iwe kuchokera kwa Ambuye wako. Koma Mulungu amasankha wina aliyense amene Iye afuna kuti alandire chisomo chake ndipo Mulungu ndiye mwini zabwino zazikulu
